sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./about.css"; const About = () => { return (

- About Me

(let me introduce myself to you (ﾟ▽ﾟ)/)

Hi,

I am Xi Lu. I have more than two-years of experience as a front-end developer. This includes the use of WordPress in creating website with HTML, CSS and JaveScript. Here is the details of what I did in the past.

Firstly, although I worked a lot on Wordpress, I also need to use code to meet the customers' special requirements, like how to make a banner or heading part more stunning. In the last two years, there were many aspects that I need to take care for the websites, including website templates, plugins, maintenance, SEO.{" "}

Secondly, for the back-end, I know how to use structured query language to process data in a relational database, like mySQL, this is also very important for all kinds of websites.{" "}

Thirdly, for working softwares, I used Jira and Confluence for workflow and creating test cases for the web applications we created.{" "}

Last but not the least, as I mentioned SEO for our websites, I use google analytics and google search console to create a SEO report to see how our websites are running on Google.

Kind Regards,

Lucy

- Skills

Languages:  HTML, CSS, React, JavaScript, Java

Databases:   MySQL, MongoDB

Softwares:    Jira, Confluence, MS Office, Figma

Systems:       Windows, Mac OS X, Android, IOS

Google:          Google Analytics, Google Search Console

CMS:               WordPress, Webflow, Wix, Shopify

); }; export default About;
